stay.copy:
Stay on-site at the World Equestrian Center by booking an elegant room at the Equestrian Hotel, just a few steps away from the action. For
 those seeking something more laid-back, The Riding Academy Hotel offers a comfortable stay within walking distance. Travelers in RV rrigs or pets can enjoy an easy stay at Ocala RV Martin Camp Resort.

dine.copy: Start your day with a cappuccino and coffee at Emma's Patisserie, where croissants savor daily-made pastries and fresh breads. To relax at night, Stirrups Restaurant serves steaks and seafood in an elegant setting right at the venue. For a casual spot, stop by Darrell's Diner, a short drive away and a family-friendly atmosphere.

essentials.copy: Need to stock up on supplies or equestrian gear, Ocala has you covered. Walgreens Pharmacy and CVS Pharmacy are one stop spots for quick health pickups. For year round service, Pablix Super Market on Blitchton Road is a go-to, and the team at Contour Saddlery offers equestrian tacks and gear close to the venue.

locale.copy: Ocala is a horizon of spaces, green fields, and clear skies. Spring brings a mix of mild weather and sunshines, and the community keeps things running. The World Equestrian Center brings together all that makes Ocala a destination worth visiting for riders, trainers, and families alike.

outro.copy: Whether you stay on site or venture farther out, our selection of stay, dine, and essentials makes it simple to navigate your time at WEC Ocala. Enjoy your stay!
